label: Prepaid Travel Money Cards
description: Cards that allow users to load money onto them before traveling abroad, avoiding foreign transaction fees and providing a safer way to carry money.
intents: Safer way to carry money while traveling
Convenient way to manage travel budget

subcategories.label: Cards for Under 18s
subcategories.description: Prepaid travel money cards designed for minors under the age of 18.

subcategories.label: No-Fee Cards
subcategories.description: Prepaid travel money cards that do not charge foreign transaction fees.

subcategories.label: Visa Cards
subcategories.description: Prepaid travel money cards that are issued by Visa.

subcategories.label: Multi-Currency Cards
subcategories.description: Prepaid travel money cards that allow users to load multiple currencies onto them.

subcategories.label: Contactless Cards
subcategories.description: Prepaid travel money cards that allow users to make contactless payments.
